page.title: 16GROVE_ AFTER CARE HOME
page.content: In Bodfari there is a Residential After Care Home ,Grove Hall,for people who are handicapped or who have suffered from mental illness. Most of the residents come from the North Wales Hospital,Denbigh . At present there are thirty nine residents being cared for by seven day time staff and one at night. Many activities such as horse riding, swimming,rounders,and cricket are arranged for the residents.There is also a games room where they can play table tennis and games such as domminoes and bingo. The residents are encouraged to mix with the villagers and can be seen at some of the local events such as the Aberwheeler Sports.
